summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing City participation in a United States Department of Justice Drug Enforcement Administration Task Force through assignment of certain police officers thereto; increasing the expenditure allowance for Object "1000 Personal Services", Program Category "Vice/Investigation/Narcotics" (Code 320), in the 1974 Budget of the Police Department by reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
